docs.snippet: UNITED NATIONS, N.Y., Jan. 16 -- The future of the United Nations may be clouded by financial uncertainties, but this has not deterred delegates from electioneering for the seats on the Security Council that will become vacant in December.

docs.snippet: The British pound rose sharply in quiet trading on the foreign-exchange markets here yesterday. Its final quotation was $2.7920, up 12 points from last Friday's close.
